site_name: 25-27 Tryon Street and 1A Elystan Place, London SW3
description: Non material amendment to planning permission PP/18/04642 (Change of use of first and second floors of Queen's Head to residential use; demolition and replacement of 1a Elystan Place and incorporation of 1a Elystan Place into the site, including alterations to provide 1 No. dwelling at ground to third floor level of 1a Elystan Place and rear extensions and second and third floors of 1a Elystan Place and at basement and ground floor to create additional pub floorspace to the Queen's Head; demolition and replacement of 25 Tryon Street involving the change of use of 25 Tryon Street to create 1 No. dwelling, including excavation of basement and alterations; form mansard roof on the Queen's Head pub to provide 1 No. dwelling; installation of plant and associated ducting rear extensions at first and second floor levels and other associated alterations) for changes to lighting scheme and the trigger of conditions 12 and 16
